global_caption: a scene featuring a grandfather wearing a black beret, a white shirt, a gray cardigan, black pants, and black shoes, watching the right side; a mother wearing a flower-patterned white one-piece dress, holding a brown basket, wearing sandals, seeing the front; a father wearing a blue short-sleeved shirt and beige shorts, holding a black plate with many water bottles, and wearing sandals, seeing the front; and a little girl wearing a sleeveless pink top and pink shoes while holding a yellow balloon and a white teddy bear, watching the front.
